revision.comment: DarkShadow moved page [[Intel PRO / Wireless 5000 LAN CardBus Adapter]] to [[Intel PRO/Wireless 5000 LAN CardBus Adapter]] over redirect
revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Intel_PRO/Wireless_5000_LAN_CardBus_Adapter |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = WCB5000 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = A54 |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0007 |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 2500 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = J3OWCB5000,J3OWCB5000A |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:05:3C |chip1 = Atheros;AR5210; |chip2 = Atheros;AR5110; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Xircom |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = a |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/18/2001 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 735858151818 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00006BBU0 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Malaysia |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card has an additional FCC ID of J3OWCB5000A (submitted to the FCC 12/10/2001). Both filings use the exact same photos. {{WiFiCert|W000865|01/08/2003}} ==Links of Interest== [http://downloadcenter.intel.com/SearchResult.aspx?lang=eng&ProductFamily=Wireless+Networking&ProductLine=Intel%C2%AE+Centrino%C2%AE+Wi-Fi+Products&ProductProduct=Intel%C2%AE+PRO%2fWireless+5000+LAN+CardBus+Adapter Downloads on the Intel site] ==Notes== ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
16:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5210 Wireless Network Adapter [AR5000 802.11a] [168c:0007] (rev 01)
	Subsystem: Intel Corporation Device [8086:2500]
	Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 16
	Memory at 84000000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
	Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
	Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k info dump=== 
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x10
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: CO
ath: Regpair used: 0x10
cfg80211: Calling CRDA for country: CO
ath5k: phy2: Atheros AR5210 chip found (MAC: 0x7, PHY: 0x3)
ath5k: phy2: RF5110 5GHz radio found (0x2)
